unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent injection. IIT-Bombay consistently provides top candidates. We've seen great success recruiting from there. The "3 Idiots" film highlights the potential. Packages start at Rs. 6 LPA, going up to Rs. 15 LPA based on performance and role. Candidates are expected to relocate anywhere in India. Training lasts 6 months. Please apply before 15th August.
